request.description:
### Send Email

This endpoint allows you to send an email to the specified recipients.

#### Request Body

- title (string, optional): The title of the email.
    
- emails (array of strings): The list of email addresses to which the email will be sent.
    
- subject (string, required): The subject of the email.
    
- body (string, required): The body content of the email.
    
- config (object):
    
    - fromEmail (string, required): The sender's email address.
        
    - isHtml (boolean, required): Indicates whether the email body is in HTML format.
        

#### Response

The response is in JSON format with the following schema:

``` json
{
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "message": {
      "type": "string"
    }
  }
}

 ```

- config (object):

    - isHtml (boolean, required): Indicates whether the email body is in HTML format.
